title: 7 News Belize
description:
PM Says New Flour Mill Sign Of Booming Economy

Manna Flour is made right at their factory in Carmelita. The flour mill officially opened today and the PM headed right over after his flight landed in Belize. But before he left for Orange Walk, we asked him what this new mill means for the country.
